body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Bryan Edwards and the customer's name is Dorothy Simmons.  The conversation is about a random business (a Pawn Shop ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Gold Star Pawn Shop. My name is Bryan Edwards. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Bryan, my name is Dorothy Simmons. I have some questions about your privacy policy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's nice to meet you, Dorothy! Of course, I can help with that. We take customer privacy very seriously at Gold Star Pawn Shop.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That’s good to hear! Can you tell me how you protect my personal information?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely! We use secure systems to store your data and restrict access to authorized personnel only. May I ask for your phone number to provide you with more detailed information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's seven one eight, five five five, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Dorothy! Also, could you please confirm your date of birth for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it’s March eighth, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Thank you for providing that information. Rest assured, we uphold strict measures to keep your information safe.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, Bryan. It makes me feel more comfortable using your services.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Dorothy! If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
